lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: Life has been good to me. It's time to share.
lender.occupational_info: After several decades in commercial broadcasting, I now enjoy designing and printing a variety of items for businesses across the U.S.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life. By helping just one person, you can in effect help an entire family. I loan because it's better to give than receive. I loan because it feels like the right thing to do. I loan because I care.

lender.name: Natalia
lender.loan_because: If I can do some good for someone then I have done my job. Thank you Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: I am attending college right now and will hopefully become a teacher.

lender.name: Jenkins Family
lender.loan_because: We live fortunate lives in Canada. We simply want to share our good fortune with those who need it.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I help determine the value of property

lender.name: Esther
lender.loan_because: I can sit in my living room and make a difference in a stranger's life. Wireless philanthropy thanks to KIVA. Wonderful.
lender.occupational_info: I put a roof over my family 's collective head by editing movies. I also make my own cool films, but more as a labor of love. I'm stuck in a dark room all day surrounded by computer and video equipment secretly longing for the great outdoors but I enjoy what I do, most of the time and the cost of living is high in LA so... I'll be spending a lot more time cooped up in a dark room.

lender.name: Marylynne
lender.loan_because: I want to feel that I am contributing in some small way to make this world just a little bit better!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a retired senior and have a very limited income but see it as my duty to give back to society and help others, no matter how small it is!

lender.name: Scott
lender.occupational_info: I'm a scientist who manages a group of people working on clean energy and clean water projects at the Palo Alto Research Center.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for checking business operations and records for proper execution and ensure company's assets are safeguarded.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.occupational_info: Student. Future career possibly in energy efficient building design and/or sustainable energy solutions.

lender.name: Matt and Jillian
lender.loan_because:
The best way to help someone escape extreme poverty is to give them the tools they need to support themselves.
It is easy to feel like there isn't a way to help people in developing countries when you are half a world away, but Kiva is an easy and simple way to change lives (without even leaving your home!)

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy to know that I can help other people have their own business.
lender.occupational_info: I consult with people interested in how to use the internet for business both now and in the future ;-)

lender.name: Shell Dockly
lender.loan_because: Life is short so love one another and help wherever & whenever you can.
lender.occupational_info: I have my health, food ,water, and shelter and a job that covers all my expenses. I am so richly blessed and I wish the same for others.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: Because... I have a little that can be part of a lot. Where else can $25 have such an impact on the success of a business and peoples' lives? I'm pleased to be part of their dream and success. Kiva is a brilliant idea!

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate for the opportunities that I have been given, and am happy to have the chance to help provide opportunities for others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an organization that researches treatements for liver disease.

lender.name: Donna
lender.occupation: Director of Marketing for a Hospice Company
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to see their dreams become reality.

lender.name: The RadNattas
lender.loan_because: I believe that individuals can create the means for their own livelihood, if given the opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: Until recently, I worked as a teacher of young children. Now, I am studying International Security. I want to learn how to help break the poverty cycle in all places.

lender.name: missfire
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance; somebody gave me one once...
lender.occupational_info: Making my way the best I know how.

lender.name: LaSane
lender.loan_because: TO HELP GENERATE BUSINESSES GLOBAL
lender.occupational_info: PROFESSIONAL

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: We must be the change we wish to see in the world...Gandhi

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: High School Geography Teacher

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: it is a good way to improve the world and help out.
lender.occupational_info: I study law in San Francisco

lender.name: samantha
lender.loan_because: i want to be able to help others
lender.occupational_info: i work from home

lender.name: Luca
lender.loan_because: I am a business owner and appreciate other's want and need to start their own business to make a life for themselves. Because such a small amount can make such a big difference in someones self worth to be able to provide for their family.
lender.occupational_info: Empowering women in their Finances

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I would like to help out people who are not as fortunate as myself. Its a great feeling to know you can help to make a difference in some ones life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mother of five children. My husband brings in the income and supports us.

lender.name: India
lender.loan_because: helping people out is the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: i goto a highschool :)

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: I want to give a 'hand up'

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: Microcredit provides ample opportunity to people who otherwise would not be able to pursue their financial and business goals.
lender.occupational_info: I am an office worker in Sydney, Australia.

lender.name: CHERYL
lender.occupational_info: I Sell , Buy, Hire out Forklifts, & do the paper work.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: There are more ways to invest and the return is more than just money.
lender.occupational_info: Aviation

lender.name: kristen
lender.loan_because: to help those in need help themselves

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I love that I can do so much with so little. Here it is possible to make a big difference in someones life.

lender.name: Kristine
lender.loan_because: even though I don't have a lot of money I believe you can still make a difference to people who don't have the same opportunities as me.
lender.occupational_info: I study linguistics which is the study of the structures of language. In particular I study the sound structures of Arrernte, an Australian Aboriginal language.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I feel good knowing that i am helping someone fulfill their goals in life.
lender.occupational_info: I currently work as an Assistant In Nursing and am also studying to become a Registered Nurse

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs the opportunity to achieve their dreams, no matter the size.
lender.occupational_info: I produce and direct television shows.

lender.name: ana
lender.loan_because: To make a difference.

lender.name: judith
lender.loan_because: i loan because the is so many people who just need that little bit of help to get started in life ..

lender.name: Susan & daisy
lender.loan_because: A small amount of money can do so much to help people start a business and improve their lives and that of their children
lender.occupational_info: relaying calls for the deaf and hearing impaired

lender.name: Vanessa
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of making a loan and relending because it's a way of continuously helping people without extra expense (especially important for students!)
lender.occupational_info: I study communications and work in pr.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: my focus is on sustainable health and wellness for all. This is a way for me to be able to reach those very far away from me.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the health and wellness industry utilising organic products. I organise sustainable and ethical fundraising for organisations and provide individuals with a means to improve areas of their lives.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: i can help people who are trying to help themselves!
lender.occupational_info: student

lender.name: Wendy
lender.whereabouts: Old Mt Druitt New South Wales

lender.name: Annabelle
lender.loan_because: I believe that we can change the world one person at a time...
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying to become a speech pathologist.

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity to grow.
lender.occupational_info: entering orders into the computer and paying the staff.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: It feels great!

lender.name: Sim
lender.loan_because: I want to give people in developing countries a chance to maintain an income and a richer life. Microfinancing supports peoples dreams of running their own business and allows them the opportunity to contribute to their society in a benefitial way

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way to help improve someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an insurance company that lodges claims over the phone. When people have car accidents and need to claim, they ring me!

lender.name: Phoebe
lender.loan_because: I love this idea! it is fantastic that you can help someone else by empowering them to build a future for themselves, their children and their community. I also love that you can really see where your donation goes.
lender.occupational_info: Right now i'm a student studying psychology at university, and will finish at the end of this year. i'm really looking forward to starting work after graduating.

lender.name: joyce
lender.loan_because: as a woman I know other women will do well given the oppotunity

lender.name: Louise
lender.loan_because: I want to help where I can

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: To help people less fortunate than my family.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: This is a great way for people to reach their potential.
lender.occupational_info: Consultant

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I really want to help make a difference in another person's life.
lender.occupational_info: Worthwhile, fulfilling, stressful at times, enjoyable, GREAT!

lender.name: KJE
lender.loan_because: I received assistance to start up my own business many years ago. It gives me great pleasure to now be in a position to help others do the same.

lender.name: Chloe
lender.loan_because: I feel I can make a difference to other people's lives who are in need...
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student, studying in high school in my last year!

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I don't have heaps of money but it's still more than some have.
lender.occupational_info: I'm from Sydney Australia, married with one daughter. I'm a stay at home mum as I care for my gorgeous daughter who is disabled and I work when I can -:¬¶:-‚Ä¢:*'"*:‚Ä¢.-:¬¶:-‚Ä¢HAVE A GREAT DAY‚Ä¢-:¬¶:-‚Ä¢:*'''*:‚Ä¢-:¬¶:-

lender.name: Bellydance Oz
lender.loan_because: I can put the income from my bellydancing website to good use

lender.name: Christie
lender.loan_because: Someone gave me a loan to get started and while I haven't paid it all back yet, I still want to give to others. I also believe that we are called to give and so I'm just answering that call in small ways. Maybe one day I can answer it in larger ways.
lender.occupational_info:
First and foremost, I am a wife and a mother. My son is 3 yrs old and my daughter is 8 months old and they take up a lot of my time :). I love it.
In the last few months I have started importing scrapbook and crafting supplies from China and the USA to Australia. I sell them on ebay and at local markets. My hope is to help pay off our mortgage and enable our family to give more to others. I love having this small business on the side. I'm doing something that I think benefits others - directly or indirectly.

lender.name: Margot
lender.loan_because: I want to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I look after 2 very energetic primary age children.

lender.name: Kristy
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying law at the University of Sydney

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Lisa Jane
lender.loan_because: Life Purpose !

lender.name: Janetta
lender.loan_because: It is one way of helping others to achieve, I believe we are all one big family
lender.occupational_info: I have just finished work after 42 years, now its time for me to relax

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: To give others the oppertunity to have a better life. We are very fortunate and we don't realise how difficult it can be for others in this situation.

lender.name: Tania
lender.loan_because: the idea of giving someone a loan rather than a hand out gives them a lot more self worth and empowerment. People are responsible for the money themselves and i think it will help them achieve even bigger dreams because other people believe in them!

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: it helps others to achieve better things for themselves and their community.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I can. It's such a small thing for one person to do that can have such a huge impact on someone elses life
lender.occupational_info: I co-ordinate help to travellers who get sick or injured while travelling.

lender.name: Jayden
lender.loan_because: I am young and i feel that i need to help people that are less off than me and i didnt know how to go about it then i found KIVA. kiva is just a fantastic way to give pople that chance that thay need to make somthing of there lives.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: I want my granddaughter to live in a fairer world, and we all have an obligation to do our best to change what we can for the better.
lender.occupational_info: As an accountant I help small businesses to grow.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference to the lives of people. It a great experience to create and develop your own business and set the standards and service you want to provide for people and it is a great way to create a lifestyle that works for you.
lender.occupational_info: I recruit people for employment to organisations primarily in the Community Service and Health Sector as well as for some corporations.

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: I loan because it gives the opportunity to give someone the ability to achieve their dreams
lender.occupational_info: I work in a supermarket working with computers and rearranging products on shelves with company reps. and Duty Management

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I have been a single mother now remarried with 5 children. I have been helped along the way many times so its my turn to help. Happy mothers with self worth have happy children.
lender.occupational_info: Busy mother of five . Have small farm.Horses Cows chickens & vegetables . Happy husband happy animals happy children and happy life.

lender.name: Rajinder
lender.loan_because: in my lifetime I'd like to make a difference to at least one person's life.
lender.occupational_info: I counsel people who have issues that are overwhelming for them, enabling them to create healthy lives by utilising their own resources.

lender.name: Briony
lender.loan_because: I think everyone should have the opportunity to be successful and be able to provide for their family. If my small donation can help someone give their family a better life, I have achieved my goal.
lender.occupational_info: I sell holidays.

lender.name: Jodie
lender.loan_because: It is the little things that make a difference.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help at some time in their life. I have so it's my turn to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I love what I do - I do my best to help people emotionally and physically with massage - I find it a very rewarding career.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: It is a wonderful feeling to be able to help another & open the thought that anything is possible.

lender.name: Janine
lender.loan_because: It feels good to give to people that cant afford the things that we take for granted

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I can help another person/family to better their life
lender.occupational_info: I help sick and lame horses to get back to health

lender.name: Louise
lender.loan_because: People throughout the world should have the same opportunities to provide a quality and sustainable lifestyle for their family regardless of their race and origin. Micro loans gives us the opportunity to help our fellow man to provide those opportunities.

lender.name: Deb
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Danni
lender.loan_because: We are put on earth to help each other on our journey. Kiva is a fun and easy and inexpensive way to bless someone who needs some support.
lender.occupational_info: I am a busy stay at home Mum to three pre-schoolers.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: It's a blessing to be able to give.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: Its easy, low cost and helps small business people who are giving it a go but may not be able to obtain a loan otherwise.
lender.occupational_info: Registration of people/company's trade marks/brands in Australia and around the world so they hav exclusive rights to their names to stop their competitors copying them.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: the world needs it.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: When it rains, it doesn't rain everywhere, but everyone needs water.The water in the mountains is piped to people in the valley who received no rain. Material wealth is the same, it rains in different places and God expects us to share the wealth. Ensign 9/06 P77 Brad Christensen Alpine Utah Stake.

lender.name: kathy
lender.loan_because: I want to share my blessings with others both locally and globally.

lender.name: Triphina
lender.loan_because: Giving is a blessing and I realise that there are many out there doing it tough so if we all do our bit no matter how big or small we are helping to ensure those less fortunate are in a position to help themselves and others. It's about letting that Love flow.
lender.occupational_info: I help to improve the quality of the health service for users.

lender.name: Nichole
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to make a real contribution to others less fortunate and assist others in reaching their goals.
lender.occupational_info: Administration of government grant funds to Australian Indigenous Organisations.

lender.name: Olwyn
lender.loan_because: I was inspired by the story on Oprah
lender.occupational_info: I teach 11 and 12 year old children in a Government school in Canberra - Australia.

lender.name: Lorraine
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: Self employed provider of bookkeeping & business services

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: we are all a part of humanity. Only together do we truly embody the love of God.
lender.occupational_info: I help teenagers develop faith in God and communicate their mistakes do not define who you are.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: It lets me express my commitment to addressing hunger and development issues in a personal way.
lender.occupational_info: Providing spiritual care for persons with life limiting illnesses.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: In some small way, I am able to help those who do not have the benefits of a wealthy society. I display a bumper sticker on my car which reads 'Practice Random acts of Kindness' and I strive to do this every single day.
lender.occupational_info: I am a volunteer palliative care support worker. My role is to support the 'client' who has a life threatening illness and the family. I do this by home visits to the client, so that the carer can take some mucn needed respite, I also visit patients in the palliative care ward of my local hospital

lender.name: Dianne
lender.loan_because: I can and I want to make a difference in other people's lives. I am blessed to be living in such an abundant place as Australia and as a nation, we can afford to share.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the field of mental health from a practice framework of recognizing and acknowledging people's strengths and focusing on ability not disability.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: Because I can, I guess I take for granted how lucky I am sometimes I am happy to help someone who genuinely needs it.

lender.name: Lucy-Anne
lender.loan_because: I want to teach my sons that there is "greater pleasure in giving than receiving". I want to help others help themselves, and I love to help when I can.
lender.occupational_info: First and foremost I'm mum to 3 beautiful boys and wife to Brendan. I work in the airline industry.

lender.name: Kara
lender.loan_because: I wanna make a difference for someone in this world

lender.name: Flora
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I used to teach marketing at Deakin University in Melbourne. Now I spend my days renovating our house and reading.

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: I wish people to be independent and successful and happy. this opportunity starts people toward these.
lender.occupational_info: I am a salesman for an insurance company.

lender.name: Sally L
lender.occupation: I\'m a full time Mum & I also work part time

lender.name: Mariane and Len Ruvinsky
lender.loan_because: We want to help people who are less fortunate than us.
lender.occupational_info: Mariane is a Certified Medical Assistant. I work in the Neurology Dept at Dartmouth-Hitchcock Medical Center in Manchester, NH. Len is an Engineer in the defense industry in Nashua, NH.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I CAN! I appreciate the life I have and want others to have good lives also. It's feels good to help out.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: Like most everybody I struggle to deal with everyday bills and issues, and forget about those less fortunate in other locations who even with just a little support can make a major impact to the lives of their family and broader community. I am sure that they will reciprocate in like measure to the best of their ability if afforded the opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I develop voice and data solutions for satellite telephones that enable their wider application to enable emergency responders to deal man-made and natural disasters faster and more effectively.greg@pacificrimusa.net

lender.name: Abi & Marty
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Valarie
lender.loan_because: I want to end poverty and the associated suffering in the world.

lender.name: Sophia
lender.loan_because: WHY NOT? it feels great to know your making a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Im a Registered Nurse, i work in a hospital.

lender.name: Melody
lender.loan_because: I just want to help.

lender.name: leo
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand every now and then.

lender.name: Naomi
lender.loan_because: though to us our lives may at times seem hard, it make me realise that there are many people less fortunate than us in the world, and the we in Australia are very lucky.
lender.occupational_info: I am a married mother of 4 gorgeous children.2 boys and 2 girls.I have been lucky enough to have been with my husband for 17 years and married to him for 10 of those years.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I have been in the position myself where I have had a great idea for a business, but had no funding. Imagine how different the world would be if everyone had the ability to develop their ideas? Also, I live in Australia. Our quality of life is ridiculously high. Fifty bucks to us is a carton of beer.
lender.occupational_info:
I am a graphic designer. I mainly specialise in logo designs and packaging design. I am also interested in writing, drawing, painting.
Find me on facebook. Daniel Abela.

lender.name: Stella & Samson
lender.loan_because: it would be great to help people be able to stand on their feet fiancially secure, and keep on giving by investing in the future.

lender.name: Jacquie
lender.loan_because: I can and I believe in good karma. It's nice to know that just a LITTLE bit of money actually can make a BIG difference in somebody else's life.
lender.occupational_info: I help people get loans for houses. They come to me to help them find the best loan, instead of having to speak with several bank managers to find a good loan. I don't actually give the money, I just help them with all the paperwork, and talk to the lenders for them. I save them time and money.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I don't have much but I am lucky to have what I do have. So what I can do is share and help a dream come true.
lender.occupational_info: I did work at a school before I had my first child, love working with children and watching them grow. Now I am watching and teaching my child grow into a fine young adult.

lender.name: GuardedGal
lender.loan_because: I am committed to giving back to the global community from which I have learned so much over the years
lender.occupational_info: I help raise funds to provide services and support for people living with cystic fibrosis in Western Australia

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: There is no excuse not to!

lender.name: Angela & Lance
lender.loan_because: We care. Positive way to be able to give back something to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We invest in shares and property.

lender.name: julianne and Rick
lender.loan_because: i want to teach my children that they are very lucky to have what they have, and that there are children around the world that don't even have a bat and ball, let alone a tv, play station, wii, laptop and so on... So now my 5 lovely's are going to save there silver, to help other families get what they need in life. Unfortunetly we don't have alot of money to help everyone, but if we can help in a tiny way then it will make the whole family happy.
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home and raise our 5 children while my partner runs his own business

lender.name: Louise
lender.loan_because: To help others suceed
lender.occupational_info: I teach Maths to secondary students

lender.name: Steve & Traci
lender.loan_because: We have visited developing countries and want to make a real difference. Every person in the world deserves the chance to realise their dreams, and to live a happy life.
lender.occupational_info: Steve designs and draws plans for the construction of buildings and houses. Traci is having some time off work. We live in Queensland, Australia.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: To overcome poverty, we must encourage human initiative and free-enterprise.
lender.occupational_info: Geography student.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: I think the only thing better than helping people is helping them help themselves. Love to see confidence and self esteem develop, especially in girls and women.
lender.occupational_info: Single mum, full time student.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I believe it's better to teach a person to fish, than give a person a fish. Also people don't need charity, they need inspiration and the means to build a better life for themselves.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: A small donation can make a world of difference to people in need. In this country we are so fortunate. Its not asking alot of anyone to give to those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the Video, Photo and Music business. Mostly weddings, but also corporate and small jobs within the community.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I saw it on Oprah and i can't really afford to donate money just yet, but I can lend $25 no probs, so I checked out the site and thought why not?
lender.occupational_info: I work at the reception desk in the ward of a private hospital and organise all of the doctors and nurses records and results and welcome patients when they arrive and see them out the door as they leave.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the life of someone not as fortunate as I am.

lender.name: Shanntelle
lender.loan_because: I want to see change in the world and to help people provide for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: It's a pleasure for my daughter and me to share with other people.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people in organisations and businesses to listen and speak to each other, and make plans for a sustainable future.

lender.name: Bernadette and Natalie
lender.loan_because: Natalie (10 years old says: "I loan because I have the chance to have been born in a family that lives in a nice place where they can give me presents and I think that other people that weren't born with that chance should still have it. Bernadette says: I loan because I want to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: We live in Paris where Natalie (10) goes to a French school and I am an entrepreneur having founded Visibility Branding where I help entrepreneurs and individuals develop a strategy to build, market and express their brand.

lender.name: Megan & Kenyon
lender.occupation: Receptionist for Adult Community Education College
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to live below the poverty line. I was a single mother & was not eligible to get a loan. I now have a job, my son is 20 & I have a very supportive partner. I want to share my good fortune with others. I believe in wealth distribution throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I answer phones and book people into courses at our college. I also work on the computer, do filing and other office tasks

lender.name: Keng
lender.loan_because: I thought this was a great idea and would like to help. look forward to be a permanent lender lending more and more!

lender.name: Joseph & Melanie
lender.loan_because: It's what Jesus called us to do. Plus, we love people, and want to bless them as God blesses us! :)

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: I just registered and want to learn a lot more about Kiva. I will be loaning soon. I like to help people who are willing to work to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a web developer and am looking to see how I can best promote Kiva on the web sites and in the newsletters I send out. Current sites include: http://www.carsalesasia.com http://www.deep-field-relaxation.com http://www.motorcycleasia.net http://www.mcpfederation.com http://www.bantayturista.com etc

lender.name: Joe, Athena & Alexandria
lender.loan_because: "whatever you do to the least of my brothers I will do unto you"
lender.occupational_info: I work in the minning industry, wife works as a medical physician and our "jewel in the crown" is in university.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I have a very fortunate life and would like to help to make a difference

lender.name: Swingkitten
lender.loan_because: i want to encourage people to achieve their goals

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to take control and better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people.

lender.name: DONNA
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves the chance to support their family and build their economy.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someones life. They have so little, we have so much. We should all be helping to make a difference in this world.
lender.occupational_info: I am fortunate that my husband has a good income and I can stay at home with my 2 kids.

lender.name: Maria
lender.occupational_info: Stressful, but quite rewarding. With my age I have learnt to be more patient. I care for my 89yr Mother in her own home.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: i care

lender.name: Eliesha
lender.loan_because: I want to be an active member part of our global community and I am in a position where I can share what I have to help other people make a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a social worker or support worker. I work with all types of different people to help them get their lives on track.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I want to help women overcome poverty and achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I am developing a first aid course for mental illness - how to help someone who is unhappy, distressed or traumatised.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women have a chance and this loaning system offers them a way do to so by helping themselves.....
lender.occupational_info: Customer Service in local Government

lender.name: Marg
lender.loan_because: We all need the opportunity to be able to support our family's. My small amount can make a big difference in so many life's.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: seinfeldesque
lender.loan_because: it feels nice to help.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I want to give the opportunity to people to help themselves to a better life

lender.name: shelley
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in a more disadvtanged environment than me. I am time poor due to having 2 small children and pregnant with another child so this way I can loan money and see how my recipients do good and flourish in business.
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home and look after my 2 children aged 2 and 3. I feel i am very fortunate to be in a position to be able to afford to stay at home and care for them.

lender.name: Ronny
lender.loan_because: of the old saying... "Give a man a fish, feed him for a day; teach a man to fish, feed him for a lifetime" and what better way than to give money to those who can use these resources to help improve their lives. And because I am truly blessed I want to give to others

lender.name: Lourdes & Candace Rose
lender.loan_because: I believe in being of service to those I love and to the world. This is an opportunity for me to contribute to someone I may otherwise never have met or had the chance to help. Maybe their dreams will come true!!
lender.occupational_info: I listen to people's personal stories and help them find a better way to live if they so wish.

lender.name: Lucia
lender.loan_because: At some point in our lives, we all may need a helping hand.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: its nice to be able to help others

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: It is an easy way to help others become self sufficient and give others a helping hand when they need it. Living in the "Lucky Country" and being able to help others is a reward in it self.

lender.name: josie
lender.loan_because: I love to give others the opportunity to thrive and prosper and help their families
lender.occupational_info: Artist

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.occupational_info: work in a large hotel checking rooms before a new guest stays for the night

lender.name: solange Andrade
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to help someone improve their life and their childrens lives.

lender.name: Lovestamp
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to struggle and have a dream that you want to see fulfilled. If I can help, even a tiny bit, then at least I have done something, and maybe just maybe one day they can pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: First and foremost I am a mum to 2 gorgeous children, a daughter and a son. I also have an internet business that I run on ebay selling recycled clothing. Also we have a small business that we have been running for 3 years.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: Kiva is such an easy way to help people in need to become self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I work with tourists from Australia and visitors to our country from all over the world.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: it's the least i can do!

lender.name: Lesley
lender.loan_because: What goes around comes around.

lender.name: The Glavic Family
lender.loan_because: I like to think that I can make a small bit of difference to someone who really needs a break. This is something that we all can do, and we all should do. Thankyou Kiva, for this opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I look after my five year old daughter and three year old son on a full-time basis. I also maintain my household as my husband works full-time on his own business.

lender.name: gvidas
lender.loan_because: giving makes me fill rich.
lender.occupational_info: PhD student in Physics. I am investigating novel materials for future nanoelectronic devices

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: I want to...

lender.name: Alessandro E. H.
lender.loan_because: I think that the best way to help people is by giving them the means to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work with technology helping people send money to each other on the internet.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I believe in paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I arrange music for people to sing without accompaniment - a cappella singing.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I want everyone to live the life they want.
lender.occupational_info: I am a music teacher and teach children aged 6-13.

lender.name: Helene
lender.loan_because: I've been looking for a way to help and find this a great idea
lender.occupational_info: I work with account managers on their National portfolios in providing day to day assistance to them and their clients.

lender.name: Hellen
lender.loan_because: At some time in our lives we ALL need a helping hand. I am full of admiration for all these people who are working tirelessly to support their families. I applaud you.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: this is one way that I can love Jesus Christ.

lender.name: Meghan
lender.loan_because: There are so many good people in the world that just need a little help. I love the idea that I have the ability to give someone a better chance at success & happiness.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Teaching Assistant of Instructional Technology at a primary school, which means that I teach kids ages 5 - 8 how to use computers & technology to supplement their education.

lender.name: Ali
lender.loan_because: I think it will make a bigger impact than giving to local charities
lender.occupational_info: I work for global networking company

lender.name: Pussen
lender.loan_because: I am working on a start up a hospitality venture in South Africa.
lender.occupational_info: I am an aspiring entrepreneur with plans to develop a hospitality and tourism venture.

lender.name: Bridgette
lender.loan_because: it is my goal to become a better humanitarian to my world community...Knowing I have helped my fellow man is so empowering. I have recieved so much joy, love and gratitude for just being able to help another.
lender.occupational_info: The job that I do is very negative. I meet people at the worst times in their lives. It has been my goal to leave the individuals that I deal with some self respect. I have to remember that at the end of the day we are ALL GODS children and should be treated accordingly.

lender.name: Audrey
lender.loan_because: I love the fact that a single donation can help several people over time and that my donation isn't just going into a charitable abyss. Great job Kiva!

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: It is my greatest pleasure to pay it forward for all the kindness and support that I have received as I built my business. I have been fortunate to be raised in a country that allows women to achieve great things and I want everyone in the world to be able to have the same opportunities that I have had.

lender.name: Denyse
lender.loan_because: I am truly blessed in my life and would love to help others achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: My most important work is ensuring that my son grows up in a giving, loving, peaceful world.

lender.name: John
lender.occupational_info: I manage music artists and put on live music shows.

lender.name: Mr. Thornton
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are an 8th grade homeroom class of 28 nice students at Sierra Middle School in Parker, Colorado.

lender.name: mabel
lender.loan_because: because planning to have business which i used to do in the philippines and the only problem is that i dont have enought money to start.
lender.occupational_info: my job is hard i worked swing ship start at 8:00 clock at night to 4:00 in the morning which its hard for me having a kid get up early and bring it to school. im terrible tired of being night worker

lender.name: Robert & Katherine
lender.loan_because: With the many blessings we enjoy, it is important to share them with others.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: When I was down on my luck, people gave to me. Now, it's my turn to give. Plus, I like to know I'm helping someone make a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: My work is a little hard to explain, but what I do basically is buy and sell money from different countries.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: it's great to lend a hand
lender.occupational_info: I help organising big events and festivals with music, dance..great cultural events that are popular with young people in England.

lender.name: Kazuhiro & Motome
lender.loan_because:
We think this idea of lending money to people who want to start business or improve their business for a better life for themselves and for their family is much more better idea than just donating to an organization. And also because we are blessed in so many ways that we think we should do something in return.
We wish you all the best with your business!

lender.name: John and Patrice
lender.loan_because: As entrepreneurs we appreciate the need for startup and expansion support for small businesses.
lender.occupational_info: We coach and train people to make the most of their lives.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Giving people an opportunity, not just a handout, is the best way the best way to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Military finance officer.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: my sister helped me to help you...
lender.occupational_info: I do the accounting for commercial rental properties.

lender.name: James
lender.occupational_info: I am currently attending college and learning to work on computers. I also work in a sandwich restaurant to support myself.

lender.name: Aileen
lender.loan_because: I think it is a wonderful and personal way to help people get ahead - one person at a time. Each of those people can affect many around them in a positive way
lender.occupational_info: Working with rural communities

lender.name: Brent
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do. I've had a very blessed life and I try to give back in anyway I can. I'm new to this site but I have a feeling I'll become a regular here.

lender.name: adrienne
lender.loan_because: I love Kiva and the work it does!
lender.occupational_info: Criminal Justice

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to help their families have a little easier time in life.

lender.name: Brianne
lender.loan_because: I would like to help other individuals and contribute as a global citizen.
lender.occupational_info: Student studying International Business and Economics, working as a Market Researcher in the New York area.

lender.name: Carlo & Friends
lender.loan_because: We wanted to help people in other parts of the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are seventh grade students. We raised money by selling baked goods and woven "school spirit" bracelets.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Ang & Carol
lender.loan_because: It seems like an easy, effective way to make a difference for someone and help promote world friendship and understanding.
lender.occupational_info: Retired symphony musician and retired banker

lender.name: Roozbeh
lender.loan_because: Sometimes all people need to improve their lives is a small loan-

lender.name: Chris and Simone
lender.loan_because: we want to change the world
lender.occupational_info: watching transport destroy the world with massive waste

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: if you can afford to, why wouldn't you? Lead by example.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: We love to make a difference!

lender.name: Randi
lender.loan_because: I don't have much money myself, by North American standards, so I can appreciate the efforts of others to simply get by.
lender.occupational_info: I grow vegetables and fruits for my family, and as an artist I do photography, relief printmaking, and bookbinding by hand. Also, I have recently returned to my former business of selling handknit clothing.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I can. Simply because I have the funding and others don't. I enjoy helping those in need.

lender.name: Antony
lender.loan_because: I've been very lucky and wish to share my good fortune with others.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: we want to share our success in the textiles industry
lender.occupational_info: We screen print on textiles that are sweatshop free. We print for clients who design their own clothing lines and businesses and special events that want to work with a printer who is committed to workers rights and the environment.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to be able to support themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Nurse working for a major supermarket company in the UK dealing with employee health. I am responsible for 33 stores and a food production factory.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to help people achieve independence and support their families through owning their own business.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse in a hospital in the United States, and I take care of sick infants.

lender.name: Global Ventures LLC
lender.loan_because:
People all over the world want to work. Kiva! provides some wonderful people the opportunity to realize their dreams...both the lenders and the borrowers.
"Do not wait; the time will never be 'just right.' Start where you stand, and work with whatever tools you may have at your command, and better tools will be found as you go along." - Napoleon Hill
"Though no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending." - Carl Bard
"A small trouble is like a pebble. Hold it too close to your eye and it fills the whole world and puts everything out of focus. Hold it at a proper distance and it can be examined and properly classified. Throw it at your feet and it can be seen in its true setting, just one more tiny bump on the pathway of life." - Celia Luce
lender.occupational_info: Deliver and Inspire

lender.name: Heath
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I manage a group of recruiters

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: Its such a simple thing to do. It costs less than a dinner out for me. Yet, it can make such a difference. How often can one person really do that? Here is my chance, and yours too...
lender.occupational_info: I help the software developers make the software the best it can be.

lender.name: Sean & Liz
lender.occupational_info: I attempt to alter US public policy to make products safer for women and children.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: Businesses are good for entrepreneurs, their families and their communities.

lender.name: Kent
lender.loan_because: A connection I have for folks all over the world who have an entrepreneurial spirit and are trying to better themselves and their families financially.
lender.occupational_info: We are a sales and service organization in the insurance business.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Kathy & Mike
lender.loan_because: hopefully it's a way to help people progress.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: Helping people to create new opportunities they wouldn't ordinarily get , gives me a great feeling and proves that giving just a little can make a big difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Beverly
lender.loan_because: It is a wonderful thing to do and it does not cost that much to make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a local newspaper. There are days when my work is a little stressful but I love it.

lender.name: Laila
lender.loan_because: I'm privileged to assist those willing to work to better their circumstances.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: It fits the type of program I believe is very beneficial.
lender.occupational_info: I am in law enforcement. My job is to work with people who have already been found guilty of crimes in court. I make sure they follow the rules of probation.

lender.name: Cindy & Julie
lender.loan_because: It takes so little to help someone succeed.

lender.name: Ben & Thomas
lender.loan_because: We like to help people have better lives.

lender.name: Gabrielle
lender.loan_because: I want to help!

lender.name: Cara
lender.loan_because: it amazes me how something so small in our country can make such a difference in another country.

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way to make a significant difference, particularly for other women.
lender.occupational_info: I help university professors use technology to better teach their students.

lender.name: Deb and Peter
lender.occupation: Real Estate in Jackson Hole, Wyoming, USA

lender.name: Dorothy
lender.loan_because: I like to help people in need
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired teacher. I have a lot of life and caring in me so I spend much of my time helping people

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: This is a way that I can make a small contribution that has the potential to make a significant impact on someone's life. It's a reminder that we are one world. And it makes me smile to do it.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: i believe in micro_economics
lender.occupational_info: I am living in pattaya

lender.name: Jan(et)
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance -- an opportunity to rise out of difficult circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired, but before that I worked as a Judicial Secretary with the Court of Appeals of KY.

lender.name: Renee
lender.loan_because: It doesn't take alot of money to make a big difference in a persons life

lender.name: Mitul
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Pediatrician interested in helping the less fortunate

lender.name: stephen
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference to people that have the capacity to make a difference for themselves but lack the funds to take the initial first step.
lender.occupational_info: I operate a consulting business helping small and large companies manage risk and control.

lender.name: Debbie Freeland
lender.loan_because: If circumstances were reversed, I'd want someone to help me.
lender.occupational_info: I copyedit and proofread college and nonfiction textbooks.

lender.name: Paige
lender.loan_because: I can and it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am blessed to be able to stay home and raise my three young children (6, 4, 2 ys.).

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: There are so many people across the world that just need someone to care for them and give them a head start in life.
lender.occupational_info: As i am a stay at home mum, my day is filled with love and happiness as i cherish every moment with my son.

lender.name: Jodie
lender.loan_because: Where there's a will - we should each help one another find a way

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: i have more than what is essential to survive... i feel its my obligation to help others who truly are in need.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: I believe it is the best way to alleviate poverty in developing countries.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I started from a gift certificate and I enjoy it and have continued to add more.

lender.name: GenerationWonder
lender.loan_because: we support sustainable livelihoods and because it gives us great pleasure to connect with others in this way.
lender.occupational_info: Fair Trade and Eco Business

lender.name: Hillary
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Assist companies and government agencies implement environmental programs.

lender.name: H Douglas
lender.loan_because: I believe in the private support of small markets.
lender.occupational_info: I sell meat, poultry and provisions to hotels, restaurants, clubs, and yachts.

lender.name: Rio Americano Kiva Club
lender.loan_because: The concept is simply amazing & what $25 can do to one person can help others too.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because:
Given that I have been born in a first world country with lots of opportunity, I think that it is important that I use what ever resourses are available to me to help out those in the developing world that don't have access to the opportunities that I have. I also feel that this is a fantastic opportunity to not just donate money, but to donate money to people that will use this money to improve their lives and enhance their ability to improve their earning ability which will open up more opportunities for them.
As the saying says: " Buy a man a fish and he will eat for the day, teach a man to fish and he will eat for a lifetime"

lender.name: Jodi, Jack, and Lily
lender.loan_because: It is a great lesson for my children and it feels good to give!

lender.name: Michael Hurst
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to struggle against all odd's. I havent had it as tough as some here requesting loans, but I can help them a little to achive their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the Water Treatment Industry. I clean mud and nasties out of the water to make it crystal clean and safe to drink.

lender.name: Louise
lender.loan_because: You reap what you sow
lender.occupational_info: I am a mum with two children, and I study psychotherapy part-time

lender.name: Blake
lender.loan_because: I have always been blessed in my life. It is only right that I attempt to share my blessings.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a large home improvement based retail store. I sell major appliances and some small appliances to individuals, property managers and builders.

lender.name: Steph
lender.loan_because: i am a single mum and i am grateful for everything i have and the opportunities i have had and wish to pass on something to help another person achieve their dreams also.
lender.occupational_info: I am a the Coordinator for a church-based Community Service in Adelaide, South Australia. We give away free groceries to disadvantaged people to help them feed their families. We establish relationship with these people in order to guide and encourage them to find opportunites in which to improve their lives and become self sufficient. We are a Christian church-based service and endeavour to show God's love through what we do. We believe that we are God's hands and feet literally.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I love that I can connect with people half a world away.
lender.occupational_info: I'm working on exciting medical technology that can help paralyzed and locked-in people walk and talk.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: I love the feeling you get from giving.. It's also very good Karma..

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I can and should. It's my social obligation.
lender.occupational_info: I sell commercial flooring and installation services. I like my job because I'm a "people person" and I get to meet lots of interesting people. Plus I am not stuck in an office all day. :-)

lender.name: RICHY & ALLY
lender.loan_because: IT'S A GREAT FEELING TO GIVE A LITTLE!!

lender.name: Callie
lender.loan_because: it's fun!
lender.occupational_info: I raise $$ for cancer research

lender.name: Alanah
lender.loan_because: Kiva not only allows you to help others help themselves but you can actually see your loan changing the lives of others.

lender.name: Collins
lender.loan_because: we are called to demonstrate Godly character..."clothe yourselves with compassion, kindness, humility, gentleness and patience..." Col. 3:12
lender.occupational_info: I have recently married a wonderful man, Jared, and we are currently in transition to move to China to pursue his international business employment.

lender.name: Katrina
lender.loan_because: it's the best retail therapy EVER!

lender.name: Peg & Denise
lender.loan_because: We are fortunate to have so much!! We would like to share it and help others make their lives better.

lender.name: Angus & Sean
lender.loan_because: We were lucky to be born in a prosperous country where we have everything we need. Our parents want us to learn that our good fortune is a privilege and teach us how we can help others around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am now 7 and am in grade 2 this year and my brother Sean is 4 years old. We've been loaning now since I was 3 and Sean was 5 mnths old!

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: this is a great idea!
lender.occupational_info: I am involved in financial markets.

lender.name: Rashmi
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to help someone get the freedom to live their life and be in control of it.
lender.occupational_info: My job involves working with people and especially those that are disadvantaged. I believe that I would not like to hurt another human being knowingly and if I can assist them in any then I am blessed.

lender.name: Savahna
lender.loan_because:
Because I have been given must I to must give, Because of thy great bounty Lord each day I live, I shall divide my gifts from thee with every brother that i see, Who has the need of help from me.
Because I have been sheltered fed by thy good care, I cannot see another's lack and I not share, My glowing fire my loaf of bread my roofs safe shelter over head, That he too may be comforted.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a single parent living in Australia looking after my three little girls

lender.name: Team Casey
lender.loan_because: even one person can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work with an agency that develops internship programs to help companies and college students connect with each other. My husband works in Sales for Procter & Gamble.

lender.name: Julie
lender.occupation: Founder of a nonprofit creating teen entrepreneurs

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Bian
lender.loan_because: I often give to other charities but always wish I could see the direct results - this way I can keep track of exactly who I am helping and why! Also it's fantastic that when it is repaid I can then make that money work for someone else!
lender.occupational_info: I am working as a nurse but will be starting my new career as a music teacher in primary schools next year.

lender.name: Audrey
lender.loan_because: It takes so little to make a HUGE difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that hospital operating rooms have what they need to perform surgery.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.occupational_info: Volunteer in Macomb IL

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves. Everyone needs help from time to time in their lives.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I think those who can should.
lender.occupational_info: Health Insurance

lender.name: Vickie
lender.loan_because: I want to help others acheive their purpose and goals.
lender.occupational_info: I am a secretary at a large denominal church.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: "Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach him how to fish and you feed him for a lifetime". Lao Tzu says it all :)

lender.name: stephen
lender.occupation: Still not sure, but open to new ideas

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: Being able to help people who have a vision and goal in order to better their family's lot in life is an amazing opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: Collision Repair Franchise

lender.name: Chelsey
lender.loan_because: Having lived and worked in a refugee camp in Africa I saw first-hand how a little can mean a lot. This is just such a wonderful forum to continue assisting and engaging with others.
lender.occupational_info: I just completed my Bachelor's in political science. Kiva is a wonderful way to connect and help individuals in Africa and the Middle East when I'm not working there.

lender.name: Rick, Susan, and Chewy
lender.loan_because: God has given us so many blessings, we want to share.
lender.occupational_info: Rick owns a small business, Susan is a lawyer, and Chewy (the dog) runs the household.

lender.name: Hudson & Lawson
lender.loan_because: My family believe in this concept... Being able to help other family's create successful business's for themselves and providing a good foundation for the next generation, is more than just worthwhile......hopefully it's life changing for the better.
lender.occupational_info: We are brothers, 3 & 5 years old. We both go to kindy school. during the week and like going to the beach on the weekends.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: it's a good thing to watch other people get what they need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at a university in Louisville, Kentucky, USA. I study medicine. I'm interested in people from other cultures and want to learn about them.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I loan to make a difference in the world, one woman at a time ...

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I like to help out people who don't have the same opportunities that were offered to me.
lender.occupational_info: If someone is having a hard time breathing, I figure out how to help them out.
